snippet.title: Chemically Bonded - Official Release Trailer / OP
snippet.description:
Follow us on Twitter for exclusive updates:
https://twitter.com/dssansVN

Chemically Bonded is a romantic drama visual novel set in modern day Japan, following the lives of two girls as they make attempts to restore their fleeted friendship. Enter the melancholic student, as you soon become entwined in their disputes. Learn more about their past as you piece together their relationship and mend their bond, all whilst forming ones of your own.

Players will be presented with choices which shapes the relationship formed with the girls. Help restart the Science club or choose to increase your athletic capabilities as you grow closer to she who holds the key to your heart.

Video editing by HowardJones
Artwork by JunProject & mB0sco
Voice acting by N i i and Amber Barile

© ds-sans 2019
